meanings.definition: A small branch or division of a plant, especially a fern or palm.
meanings.sent1: The rachillae of the fern looked delicate and green.
meanings.sent2: The palm tree had many rachillae extending from its trunk.
meanings.sent3: The fern's rachillae whispered secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The palm's rachillae danced in the breeze like tiny fingers.
meanings.sent5: I carefully examined the intricate rachillae of the plant under a magnifying glass.

meanings.definition: A series of small, closely set bracts or flowers along a central axis.
meanings.sent1: The rachillae of the flower cluster were beautifully arranged.
meanings.sent2: Each rachillae in the series added to the overall beauty of the plant.
meanings.sent3: The rachillae in the bouquet seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The rachillae stood out like stars in the night sky of the plant.
meanings.sent5: I marveled at the intricate patterns formed by the rachillae along the central axis.
